Articles.Content:
Hi!

As you all know I am a member of the forums who's popping in from time to time but I guess this is the end.

I have decided to stop posting for at least 6 months (when my family... issues are sorted out) after the release of 1.0.

(if you know a better place to put this let me know)

It's been fun, and I will be back.

Ken

P.S. I will lurk but not post

P.P.S. Might post a few blogs

Farewell!

:-:7
Goodbye Ken! May misfortune always follow you but never catch up. And if you never come back, have a nice life, whether you live it as a prince or a pauper.
